title: Rank rewards
body: Last season I hit silver 5 and received an icon with a border. At the end end of this current season I climbed to silver 3 and ended with a loosing streak, but I don't seem to have any border or profile flairs from being silver. At the moment I have the default border. I had a 2 week ban in the middle of September. Can anyone tell me why I didn't get a silver border at the end of this season?

replies.body: Don't fret just yet about those ranked rewards. They're still in the process of being delivered and should all be out by the end of the month. If you don't see yours in about a week or so, feel free to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Thanks for the reply! I noticed afterward that ranked rewards were still being handed out.
Still don't have the ranked rewards? Despite there being an official statement that all ranked rewards have been handed out.
